JobFullDesc: In Marketing, we work across the company to bring the Uber brand to life, both inside and outside our walls. The Performance Marketing team develops and executes against data-driven marketing strategies to deliver growth and efficiency at scale for Uber. We are made up of media strategists, channel managers, and social media managers who are obsessed with getting the right message to the right customer at the right time in service of driving demand for our products.About the RoleAre you interested in driving business and product strategy? What about using data to answer difficult questions and come up with interesting insights? If so, then this is the job for you. Product analysts partner with product managers, data scientists, engineers, design, and other key business drivers and use data to deeply understand our customers and the impact that our products have on them.As a Product Analyst on this team, you will shape the experience of customers interacting with Uber products. For this role you should have excellent analytical skills, excellent time-management and organizational habits, and the ability to clearly communicate and present information for stakeholders at all levels of the business.You possess a passion for improving Customer experience by identifying and resolving friction and recommending data inspired changes to make the experience world class. You'll play a big part in finding product opportunity as we develop onboarding, engagement and retention strategies.
